feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - vSphere maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 11, 07:00 UTC  -  Aug 14, 16:00 UTC

Jul 31, 22:36 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 11/08/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 14/08/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere not accessible for 1h and hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the maintenance and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers and you can reschedule through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX][VMware Private Cloud] - Datastore maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 11, 07:00 UTC  -  Aug 21, 16:00 UTC

Jul 11, 09:01 UTC
Update - This maintenance has been re-scheduled.
Below you can find new information regarding the operation.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 11/08/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 21/08/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : You may experience a micro cut if the customer is writing a lot on their datastore.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple storage servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX2C][VMware Private Cloud] - Rack R711B02 incident notification
entry.content:
Jul 31, 05:51 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on rack R711B02 has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 31/07/2025 04:30 UTC
End time : 31/07/2025 05:36 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by an electrical equipment issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Jul 31, 05:43 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our VMware Private Cloud offer on the specific rack.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 31/07/2025 04:30 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Hosts in rack R711B02 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access their hosts located on the specified rack.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by an electrical equipment issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [SBG2A][Managed vSphere] - Equipment update notification
entry.content:
Jul 21, 17:04 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jul 21, 06:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 24, 20:27 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer.

Start time : 21/07/2025 06:30 UTC
End time : 21/07/2025 21:00 UTC
Service impact : During the operation, customers may experience a few seconds of slowness when reading from or writing to their datastore.
However, there will be no impact on the vSphere UI, data availability or virtual machines.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for multiple storage servers.

Thank you for your understanding.
